app.title: Domiro
layout.sidebar.placeholderBody: Select a section to review progress and guidance.
input.title: Domain intake console
input.description: Select a method to add domains. Validation and deduplication run automatically.
input.sidebar.title: Intake summary
input.sidebar.hintBody: Adding domains from any tab clears previous DNS and RDAP results. Run the checks again to refresh data.
input.dict.desc: Generate domains based on patterns. Example: 000000.xyz through 999999.xyz.
input.dict.templateHint: Use {n} for digits, {a} for letters, and {al} for alphanumeric values. Example: aa{n}{n}{n}.
input.dict.invalidLength: Length must be between 1 and 63 characters.
input.dict.invalidTld: Enter a valid top-level domain (for example, com or xyz).
input.dict.invalidTemplate: Enter a template that uses {n}, {a}, or {al} placeholders.
input.dict.generateFailed: Domain generation failed. Try again later.
input.dict.added: Added {{count}} domain(s) generated by the pattern tool.
input.upload.tip: Drag CSV/TXT files here or browse to upload. Large files are parsed in batches.
input.upload.unsupported: Only CSV or TXT files are supported.
input.upload.parseFailed: File parsing failed. Review the format.
input.upload.noNew: No new domains were identified in this file.
input.upload.helpContent: CSV: the first row must contain headers, with domains in the selected column. TXT: provide one domain per line.
input.manual.helper: Enter one domain per line. URLs and extra fragments are removed automatically.
input.manual.label: Manual entry
input.manual.noNew: No additional domains were added. Review duplicates or invalid entries.
page.dns.title: DNS Pre-screening
page.dns.description: Query NS/SOA records through Google and Cloudflare DoH to evaluate delegation status.
page.dns.export.hint: Export view enabled. Download the latest DNS results directly.
page.dns.snackbar.noInput: Save domains on the intake page before running checks.
page.dns.snackbar.noResult: No results are available for export.
page.dns.snackbar.retrySuccess: Retry completed for the outstanding DNS checks.
page.dns.table.title: Pre-screening results
dns.title: DNS Pre-screening
dns.subtitle.line1: Query NS/SOA records through Google and Cloudflare DoH.
dns.subtitle.line2: Quickly distinguish delegated domains from those requiring RDAP validation.
dns.stats.title: Status summary
dns.table.title: Pre-screening results
page.dns.sidebar.title: Status summary
page.dns.sidebar.hintBody: DNS pre-screening relies on public DoH responses. Final availability still depends on RDAP or registry data.
hint.dns.title: Notes
hint.dns.body: DNS pre-screening relies on public DoH responses. Final availability still depends on RDAP or registry data.
page.rdap.title: RDAP Validation
page.rdap.description: Verify domains flagged as undelegated by reviewing RDAP registration records.
page.rdap.snackbar.noTarget: No domains currently require RDAP validation.
page.rdap.snackbar.retrySuccess: Retry completed for the outstanding RDAP checks.
page.rdap.table.title: RDAP details
page.rdap.sidebar.title: Progress
page.rdap.sidebar.hintBody: When HTTP 429 is returned, the job honors Retry-After automatically. Retry later if required.
page.rdap.placeholder.noDns: Run DNS pre-screening before starting RDAP validation.
page.rdap.placeholder.noTarget: DNS pre-screening did not produce any RDAP candidates.
page.export.title: Result Export
page.export.actions.title: Export results
page.export.actions.empty: Save domains and complete the checks before exporting.
page.export.settings.title: Runtime settings
page.export.settings.dohHelper: Select at least one provider to run DNS pre-screening.
page.export.settings.providerError: Keep at least one provider active.
page.export.sidebar.title: Session overview
page.export.sidebar.hintBody: Exported JSON includes complete details without redaction. Store it securely if domains are sensitive.
page.export.snackbar.noRdap: No RDAP data is available yet.
page.settings.title: Configuration
page.settings.description: Adjust Domiro runtime parameters and query strategy.
page.settings.theme.title: Theme
page.settings.theme.description: Switch between light and dark appearances and pick Material 3 accent colors.
page.about.title: About Domiro Web
page.about.summary: A modern, web-based domain availability filter built with Material Design 3, part of the Domiro project.
page.about.status.openSource: ✔️ 100% open source, and community contributions are welcome.
page.about.status.agpl: ℹ️ Distributed under the AGPL-3.0 copyleft license—share improvements under the same terms.
page.about.status.restriction: ❌ Proprietary redistribution without releasing source code is not permitted.
parse.errors.title: Unable to parse these entries ({{count}})
dns.detail.unexpected-status: DoH returned an unknown status code
rdap.detail.status-200: RDAP returned a domain object (likely registered)
rdap.detail.status-429-wait: RDAP rate limit. Retry after {{retryAfter}} seconds.
rdap.detail.unexpected-object: RDAP response did not include a domain object
rdap.detail.unsupported: RDAP is not yet available for this TLD
rdap.detail.bootstrap-missing: IANA RDAP bootstrap does not list a service for this TLD
rdap.detail.network-error: Unable to reach the RDAP service
